title: Ghost Launch Bundle
seoTitle: Ghost Launch Bundle | Single Offer AI Store
seoDescription: Launch a Shopify offer in hours with the Ghost Launch Bundle: audited product copy, pricing, automation templates, and guardrails for safe publishing.
htmlBody:
Launch one irresistible offer without the chaos

The Ghost Launch Bundle packages the only product your autonomous store needs: a fully written, production-safe offer with pricing, positioning, and automation guardrails. Ship a single, high-converting page instead of juggling dozens of experiments.

What you get

  • Conversion-ready product page with long-form copy, hero hooks, and objection handling
  • Pricing + positioning guidance tuned for Shopify one-off or subscription variants
  • Automation guardrails so every publish is gated behind explicit approvals
  • Launch checklist covering SEO, images, and publishing toggles
  • Support for collections so you can keep navigation tidy while staying single-offer focused

Who it is for

Builders who want a disciplined, single-offer storefront instead of a sprawling catalog. If you value safety, clarity, and fast iteration, this bundle keeps your store on-rails.

How it works

  1. Review the Ghost Launch Bundle copy (this page) inside store/ghost-offer.json
  2. Run the publish script in dry-run mode to see the exact Shopify payload
  3. Flip on mutation guardrails (MUTATIONS_ENABLED=true and --apply=true) to push the product live
  4. Optionally unpublish everything else so the offer stands alone

Guarantees

No hidden upsells, no surprise edits. You control when writes happen, and every script defaults to non-mutating dry-runs until you explicitly opt in.
